mapper.sql: USERNAME, NAME1, UNIT_CODE, TEST_SCORE, MODULE, TEST_NAME, TEST_DATE, IF_QUALIFIED, CREAT_USER, CREAT_DATE, QUALIFIED_SCORE, STATE
USERNAME, NAME1, UNIT_CODE, TEST_SCORE, MODULE, TEST_NAME, TEST_DATE, IF_QUALIFIED, CREAT_USER, CREAT_DATE, QUALIFIED_SCORE, STATE

foreach.if: delete from tb_train_score where USERNAME = #{item.USERNAME} AND MODULE = #{item.MODULE}; insert into tb_train_score ( USERNAME, NAME1,UNIT_CODE,TEST_SCORE,MODULE,TEST_NAME,TEST_DATE,CREAT_USER,CREAT_DATE,QUALIFIED_SCORE ) values ( #{item.USERNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.NAME1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.UNIT_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.TEST_SCORE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.MODULE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.TEST_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.TEST_DATE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.CREAT_USER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.CREAT_DATE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.QUALIFIED_SCORE,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
